LanguageData.LogWindow_TraceBig.Description: Set the stack trace to be large on screen.
LanguageData.LogWindow_TraceMedium.Description: Set the stack trace to be medium-sized on screen.
LanguageData.LogWindow_TraceSmall.Description: Set the stack trace to be small on screen.
LanguageData.LogWindow_AutoOpenEnabled.Description: Debug log will be opened when an error is logged.
LanguageData.LogWindow_AutoOpenDisabled.Description: Debug log will NOT be opened when an error is logged.
LanguageData.LogWindow_CopyToClipboard.Description: Copy all messages to the clipboard.
